title: The Snowstorm
description: Jamal and Isha are playing outside when the wind suddenly begins to blow and the air becomes colder. As the children run inside to get their coats, white flakes begin to fall. It's a snowstorm! Supportive pictures and high-frequency words support early readers in this fun winter story.
meta: deep, fast, flakes, mouths, snow, tongues
Use the reading strategy of vizualizing to understand text
Sequence Events : Identify sequence of events
Proper Nouns : Recognize and use proper nouns
High-Frequency Words : Recognize and use the high-frequency words their and there

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
